mapper.select: select top 1 a.billcode as fixmedinsBchno , '1087165' as medListCodg, '一次性使用组织闭合夹(WS)' as medListName, -- '506724'as medinsListCodg, -- '闰中密友冰爽激情装' as medinsListName, f.goodscode as medinsListCodg, f.goodsname as medinsListName, case when c.IsPres='Y' then '1' else '0' end as rxFlag, d.PlaceNum as invCnt, e.batchcode as manuLotnum, e.ProduceDate as manuDate, e.ValDate as expyEnd, a.dates+' '+a.ontime as invDate from purinmt a WITH(NOLOCK) join purindt b WITH(NOLOCK) on a.billno=b.billno join goodsattr c WITH(NOLOCK) on b.goodsid=b.goodsid join AngleBalance d WITH(NOLOCK) on b.locatid=d.locatid and b.goodsid=d.goodsid and b.AngleId=d.AngleId and a.orgid=d.OwnerId join batchcode e WITH(NOLOCK) on b.goodsid=e.goodsid and b.AngleId=e.AngleId join goodsdoc f WITH(NOLOCK) on f.goodsid=b.goodsid where a.caozy=#{caozy} and a.orgid=#{orgid} order by a.billno desc
